Room.Name: Danielle's Mystical Mage Emporium
Room.ShortDescription: You are in Danielle's Mystic Mage Emporium between rows and rows of potions.
Room.LongDescription: Danielle's Mystic Mage Emporium stocks all kinds of potions, oils and other mysterious waters of life. You can buy just about anything you might desire here, but it will cost you a lot. Potions are not that easy to make, and Danielle needs to make enough money to pay the rent on this place.
